content:
We'll elevate your NYC stay with this exclusive offer: Complimentary room upgrade and up to 20% off, plus our host of amenities:

* Wi-Fi
* Local calls
* Coffee and tea at the front desk between 6-7 am
* Newspapers
* 2 bottles of water
* Access to fitness center and business center Heated rooftop pool and sundeck access
* Discounts for Flywheel Sports Cutler Salon and Exhale Spa
